name: Hemorrhage
description: Innate: Damaging basic attacks on-attack and abilities cause the target to bleed every 1.25 seconds for 5 seconds, dealing 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage over the duration. This can stack up to 5 times for a maximum of 65 − 150 (based on level) (+ 150% bonus AD) physical damage over the duration. The total damage is increased by 75% against  monsters.
descriptions: Innate: Damaging basic attacks on-attack and abilities cause the target to bleed every 1.25 seconds for 5 seconds, dealing 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage over the duration. This can stack up to 5 times for a maximum of 65 − 150 (based on level) (+ 150% bonus AD) physical damage over the duration. The total damage is increased by 75% against  monsters.
Upon applying full Hemorrhage stacks to an enemy  champion or killing one with  Noxian Guillotine, Darius gains Noxian Might for 5 seconds.
Noxian Might: Darius gains 30 − 230 (based on level)  bonus attack damage and instantly applies full Hemorrhage stacks through his usual means.

name: Decimate
description: Active: Darius hefts his axe for 0.75 seconds, and then swings it around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the handle.
descriptions: Active: Darius hefts his axe for 0.75 seconds, and then swings it around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the handle.
Against champions and large monsters, Darius  heals for  15% − 45% (based on enemies hit by the blade) of his missing health. The handle of Darius'  axe will not apply  Hemorrhage nor heal him.
Darius is unable to declare basic attacks or cast  Apprehend or  Noxian Guillotine during Decimate.

name: Crippling Strike
description: Active: Darius'  next basic attack within 4 seconds becomes  unstoppable, gains  25 bonus range, deals bonus physical damage and  slows the target by 90% for 1 second.
descriptions: Active: Darius'  next basic attack within 4 seconds becomes  unstoppable, gains  25 bonus range, deals bonus physical damage and  slows the target by 90% for 1 second.
If Crippling Strike kills the target, it refunds its  mana cost and half of its  cooldown.
Crippling Strike  resets Darius'  basic attack timer, and is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
The attack's animation can be cancelled by casting  Decimate, but the attack will still land.

name: Apprehend
descriptions: Active: Darius  pulls in all enemies in front of him in the target direction,  slowing them by 40% for 1 second, and briefly gaining  sight of the area around the pull.

name: Noxian Guillotine
description: Active: Darius attempts to execute the target enemy  champion,  leaping towards them to deal  true damage, increased by 0% −  100% (based on  Hemorrhage stacks).
leveling: True Damage:»100 / 200 / 300 (+ 75% bonus AD)«Bonus Damage Per Stack:»20 / 40 / 60 (+ 15% bonus AD)«Maximum True Damage:200 / 400 / 600 (+ 150% bonus AD)
levelings: True Damage:»100 / 200 / 300 (+ 75% bonus AD)«Bonus Damage Per Stack:»20 / 40 / 60 (+ 15% bonus AD)«Maximum True Damage:200 / 400 / 600 (+ 150% bonus AD)
descriptions: Active: Darius attempts to execute the target enemy  champion,  leaping towards them to deal  true damage, increased by 0% −  100% (based on  Hemorrhage stacks).

If the target dies within 0.15 seconds after being hit by Noxian Guillotine, Darius causes all nearby  minions and  monsters to  flee for 3 seconds during which they are rapidly  slowed by up to 99% over the duration, and is able to recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost, which refreshes on further executions.
At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine has no  mana cost and instead completely resets its  cooldown if it kills its target.
Darius is unable to cast  Decimate and  Apprehend for 0.25 seconds after Noxian Guillotine's cast time.
